Module com.example.umlscd
Package com.example.umlscd.DataAccessLayer.Serializers.UseCaseDiagram

Class UseCaseDiagramDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.umlscd.DataAccessLayer.Serializers.UseCaseDiagram.UseCaseDiagramDAO
public class UseCaseDiagramDAO extends Object

Use Case Diagram Data Access Object (DAO)

The UseCaseDiagramDAO class serves as the Data Access Object for the UseCaseDiagramManager class. It provides functionalities to save and load use case diagrams by serializing and deserializing the diagram manager objects to and from files. This facilitates persistent storage and retrieval of diagrams, enabling users to save their work and continue editing at a later time.

The class includes methods for saving diagrams to a specified file path, loading diagrams from a default file path, and loading diagrams from a user-specified file path. It handles exceptions related to file I/O operations and ensures that appropriate messages are logged in case of errors.

Authors: Ahmad Wyne, Wahaj Asif, Muhammad Muneeb

Version: 1.0

Since: 2024-12-03

  • Method Details

    • saveDiagram

      public static void saveDiagram(UseCaseDiagramManager manager, String filePath)
      Saves the given UseCaseDiagramManager instance to the specified file path by serializing it.

      This method serializes the UseCaseDiagramManager object and writes it to a file. If the operation is successful, a confirmation message is printed to the console. In case of an IOException, an error message is printed.

      Parameters:
      manager - The UseCaseDiagramManager instance to be saved.
      filePath - The file path where the diagram will be saved.

    • loadDiagram

      public static UseCaseDiagramManager loadDiagram()
      Loads a UseCaseDiagramManager instance from the default file path by deserializing it.

      This method attempts to read and deserialize a UseCaseDiagramManager object from the default file path defined by FILE_PATH. If the operation is successful, the deserialized object is returned. In case of an IOException or ClassNotFoundException, an error message is printed and null is returned.

      Returns:
      The deserialized UseCaseDiagramManager instance if successful; null otherwise.

    • loadDiagram

      public static UseCaseDiagramManager loadDiagram(String filePath)
      Loads a UseCaseDiagramManager instance from the specified file path by deserializing it.

      This method attempts to read and deserialize a UseCaseDiagramManager object from the provided file path. If the operation is successful, the deserialized object is returned. In case of an IOException or ClassNotFoundException, an error message is printed and null is returned.

      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path from which the diagram will be loaded.
      Returns:
      The deserialized UseCaseDiagramManager instance if successful; null otherwise.
